Written in one column, 23 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Title written in black and red.
Ownership statment by ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Sharīf al-Makkī al-Qādirī, Muḥarram 1178 [1764].
